title: I'm writing a historical fiction novel, where the main characters are Vikings. The female protagonist is named Eira. Which of these names matches hers? Brant Endre Fell Hammond Inglof Raul Uffe Ulf - Quora

response.answer_text: Fun question! OK, let’s see.., Brant, Endre, Fell, Hammond, Raul are too Westernized. Ulf is overutilized in fantasy. I’m going for Inglof. It sounds sufficiently foreign yet it’s easy to read and pronounce. If her first name is pronounced like “Ira” it also goes with that. Uffe is also good, but I’ve seen that before. Creating names is good exercise for writers. You seem to have a knack for it. Good luck with your book!
